article_text: President Barack Obama’s town hall meeting in Charlotte, which focused on equal pay for women, ended Wednesday with the president exhorting women to demand fair treatment.

article_metadata.title: Obama touts economy, blames GOP for blocking equal-pay bill | News & Observer
